text_block_list.text:
After the preliminaries. Among race fans, 
a certain rumor had started spreading about 
the 『Shuuka Sho』 and the 『Kikka Sho』 after it

text_block_list.name: Race Fan A
text_block_list.text:
First, the 『Shuuka Sho』! She may have lost in 
the preliminaries, but if Rhein Kraft wins here……

text_block_list.name: Race Fan B
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. For the Classic Triple Crown, there's no doubt a 
Triple Crown Uma Musume will be born. She's really really 
strong. And if both of them get the Triple Crown――

text_block_list.name: Race Fan A
text_block_list.text:
A Triple Crown and Unorthodox Triple Crown Uma Musume! In the same 
year! It'd be the first time in history, right? Amazing, huh!!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
……That's right. If I can win the Triple 
Crown in the same year, it'll be historic……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Everyone's got high expectations! An awe-inspiring feat! Winning 
the Unorthodox Triple Crown isn't just Cesario and my dream. Then……!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
(Haa, haa, haa, haa, haa! If I can win with my 
running, then the brilliance of the Tiara will 
be something talked about for years to come……!)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
(I want to live up to the expectations of the fans! 
I want it to be recorded in history! This chance won't 
come again! I need to get the Unorthodox Triple Crown!)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Haa……haa……Kuuu……Haa……!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Kraft-san, you're……pushing too hard aren't you……?
Yeah……you're carrying so many expectations too……
Yeah……you're carrying so many expectations too……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: No! It's something that I want to accomplish no matter what!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
That's why, Trainer-san, I want you to train me to my limits! 
So that Air Messiah won't ever be able to catch me!

Rhein Kraft was trying to handle the increased pressure 
put on her. I decided to go along with her wishes…… 
even though her expression darkened day by day.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: TaaaaaaaaaaAAAAAAAAAAAA!!
No, no, you're pushing too early!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
(I can't……really get the timing down! 
At this time――)

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Haaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
(If Cesario was with me then…… 
But……)

Cesario's absence could be felt. But, there was no point 
complaining about it. Either way, to challenge Air Messiah, 
we had no choice but to improve her abilities

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: (Adjust! Regulate! Then, the opponent's movements――Imagine it!)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
(Huh, it feels like it's getting harder to run…… But I 
guess that's normal, since we're taking countermeasures)

We were desperately searching blindly for something, anything. 
It was like fighting against shadows.

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa……haa, haa……

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text: Huu, do you suppose this might be enough for today?

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, there's no need to make any major adjustments. If you try to 
build upon something that's already complete, you'll ruin your form.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: For the you right now, there's no noise……right?

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
Yes, I no longer――feel that burden weighing on 
my heart. Not for someone else's sake, without 
fear, just――moving towards something brilliant!

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text:
Haa……haa…… In the previous 『Queen's S』 I failed 
to live up to expectations……But, next time――

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text:
The rematch with Kraft that I've been waiting for……! Since the 
『NHK Mile C』! I won't show such a pathetic run again……definitely.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san, it's finally time. When everything will be tested! 
The end of the Triple Tiara, the 『Shuuka Sho』!

We've done everything we could. Focusing on 
Air Messiah and sharpening her body and senses 
to the limit. And she had the timing down.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
I'll win……! There's nothing outside of winning! 
I know everything I need to win! I'll use everything 
to win the "Unorthodox Triple Crown"!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
Now, these maidens that have made it through the 
summer, greet the 『Shuuka Sho』 where autumn 
colors bloom! But, who will bloom the brightest?

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: And now, it starts!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Huu――

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
Will the favorite, Rhein Kraft, take the lead? No, she's 
taking position. Further back than normal, in 5th place.

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
And the 2nd favorite, Air Messiah, also settles in. 
Right around the middle of the pack.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
(Keep her reined in, keep Air 
Messiah-san reined in. To do that――)

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text:
Uuuugh…… my leg……! 
And my breathing……!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
And here, the 3rd favorite, Daring Heart, falls behind! 
It seems like her health is on the downswing this autumn!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
(Go! Right here!! 
For sure…… for sure――)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
(Towards Cesario and my 『Future』! Take hold of the 
"Unorthodox Triple Crown" and beyond that――!)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Haaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
Rhein Kraft pulls ahead! She's moving early! 
Air Messiah matches it――

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: ――No, she doesn't make a move!

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
(No matter how Kraft-san moves――it doesn't 
change anything. I will……run my own race!)

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text: Right here――!!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Air Messiah pushes forward-! And――

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: (Like this, I can win, I'll win――)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: ――Huh!?

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text: Taaaaaaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
They're lining up! She's caught up! 
Rhein Kraft out front, Air Messiah chases!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: T-this situation……!?
It's just like the preliminaries……!!

But……there's no way we'll have the same ending! 
We worked so hard to avoid that……

But……there's no way we'll have the same ending! 
We worked so hard to avoid that……

We trained hard. 
There's no way it was useless.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
(I'll win! I'll win……! Win win win! A year that will go down in 
history……! For the records, for history……the proof of the Tiara!)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: (I can't――lose!)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: I'll carve this run in to historyyyyyyyyy!!!!!!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
Rhein Kraft squeezes out the last of her strength-!! 
Which one will do it, who will win-!?

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
Haaaaaaaaaaaa!!! 
I'll be, the one to take――hold of the future!!!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Uwaaaaaaaaaaaah!!!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: She passes, she passes! The match is over――!!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
The Queen of Autumn is Air Messiah!! 
The dream of an Unorthodox Triple Crown is shattered!!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Haa……haa……Ugh……haa……!

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
Ah……Ah……Aaaaah. I, finally……!! 
The long sought after Tiara……is finally in my hands!!

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
Mother! I! I was finally able to achieve it! 
Our wish……! And our salvation……!!!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Haa…… Haa…… Haa…… 
Kuu……
And then――on October 23rd, the 『Kikka Sho』

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
A Triple Crown Uma Musume!! 
This is the moment a hero was born!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
The first Undefeated Triple Crown Uma Musume since Symboli 
Rudolf has been born! It's truly become a historic day!

text_block_list.name: Race Fan A
text_block_list.text:
Man, it was as great as I thought it would be! 
She was overwhelming!

text_block_list.name: Race Fan B
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, I can't help but look forward 
to seeing how strong she'll get!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Everyone's……only talking about the Triple Crown Uma Musume…… 
I wasn't……able to live up to everyone's expectations……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Now……nobody is talking about the Tiara……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
If I had……won then…… 
If I had gotten the Unorthodox Triple Crown then……
